column4: I have two questions: 1) When in firefox, after I click to open or download a file, and I check the box "do this from now on for these types of files", the popup still always shows up when I download that type of file. 2) Is it possible to embed PDF files into firefox in ubuntu J?
Can anyone help me with either of my issues?
change it in the actsaul Firefox settings,  edit > preferences
